name: Americas Best Value Inn Page

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: quite surprised at this hotel. Very large room, very clean and each room has a patio or balcony. Definitely a cut above the typical Super 8. Very nice front desk personnel as well--
reviews.title: GREAT Super 8

reviews.text: Simply don't stay here! Rooms are dirty, bed sheets had holes. Hotel manager is earger to confront guests (not only me). Offered breakfast and breakfast place is very inconvenient. Room is not quiet.
reviews.title: Stay somewhere else!

reviews.text: We do not have any complaints here. The rooms were oversized and had a microwave/fridge. For the price we thought it was a good value. The front desk was very courteous and helpful. The continental breakfast was average but enough to eat. I just wish there was a little more variety. There is a small laundromat on premises which comes in very handy after being on the road a week.
reviews.title: Great value for the price

reviews.text: When going back to Page, this will be where we stay.
reviews.title: Terrible place to stay
Watch Out For Manager
reviews.text: We booked our room through priceline, which we will never use again. We had a terrible stay at another Best Value Inn and didn't want to stay at another location. When I looked up hotels in Page, this hotel was not listed, but when I bid, this hotel was selected. We got there and there were spiders in the room and the toilet did not work. The AC is incredibly loud and not really functional. I got three bug bites while staying there. The breakfast is cereal on a tiny table in the tiny office. I do not recommend this hotel or priceline.

The check in staff was not very friendly or helpful. Walking to our room it smelled so strong of smoke. I was worried our room would smell also, but thankfully it did not. The room did not appear to be ultra clean. There were not enough towels in the room for the number of people we told them would be staying there. None of the ice machines in the entire building had any ice in them. Our bed rolled to one side. I thought I was going to roll off it during the night. When I pulled back the blanket, the sheets were so wrinkled that I honestly wondered if they had just made the bed without changing the sheets. I am sure I was just being paranoid, but that is really how they looked. I wish I had stayed at the Marriott property where I know I would be guaranteed a comfortable bed with crisp clean sheets. The kids did enjoy the pool the next morning, but it didn't open until 10:00 and check out was at 11:00. I don't know if it opens that late every morning or if it was becuase they had to put in chemicals.
reviews.title: Did NOT love this place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was clean, and decent. It had HBO and two queen size beds. The AC was quite old and very loud. Free breakfast turned out to be a little disaster, because all the food was put in a little corner where it's hard to get to when there're more than two people trying to get to. We ended up have only bad coffee.
reviews.title: average hotel with affordable price

likes.disliked: — Terrible breakfast...better not to have it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: basic room with two beds, mini frig and TV. We paid only $60 thru priceline while all other motels were packed. However, the cheap $$ comes at a price. Zero sound proofing. We could hear the people walking upstairs and any movement they made. We could hear the people sitting outside of their rooms in the lovely pastic chairs provided talking. We turned up the AC to drown it out. would not use priceline again. Their star ratings cannot be trusted.
reviews.title: basic motel if u are desparate

likes.liked: — it was available when no others were

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Nice experience

reviews.text: We stayed here for 1 night before visiting Antelope Slot Canyon. It was a great value! We were given a huge room with 3 queen beds. The property seem fairly new and the rooms were clean. The continental breakfast was basic (toast, mini-muffin, juice & coffee, fruit and cereal), but they did have fruitloops which even the adults enjoyed. Overall we had a fine experience and would stay there again.
reviews.title: Super8 at Page - good value!

reviews.text: When we checked in at 11:00 P.M. we found Human Feces in the trash can in the bathroom. We decided to look around and see how discusting the rest of the room was and we also found razor blades on the floor, dirty sheets and just a plain dirty room. I would not recommend this place to my worst enemy. As of one week later I still have not received my money back from the manager.
reviews.title: Dirty and Gross
Double Charged for Room
reviews.text: Admittedly we arrived pretty late at night but we were double charged for our room by the desk clerk. Instead of informing us we only discovered on our bank statement. When I called to have the charges reversed I was told that only the manger could do that and she would be coming in later that night to do so. The Manager did not come in and my repeated calls revealed that it would take a week for the charges to be reversed when the manager came in. Besides that the rooms were chilly because they don't turn on the heaters in the winter until you go into the room.
The sheets were YELLOW and there was hair on all the pillows. They don't use mattress pads and you can see through the paper thin dirty sheets to the mattress, and not just where the holes were.
reviews.title: Filthy and Disgusting, psychotic manager

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When I tried to check out and get my money back, the manager went ballistic. I was polite and calm and he started screaming at me. He told me I didn't give him 24 hours notice to cancel and when I explained that I didn't know 24 hours ago that the room was filthy, he told me he was going to charge me for all three nights - my original booking.
reviews.title: Stage hotel...

aka: Americas Best Value Inn Page Hotel Page
